Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Validation

  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • validateMeeting

        public static application.Meeting validateMeeting(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                  java.lang.String startTime,
                                                  java.lang.String endTime,
                                                  java.lang.String desc,
                                                  application.Diary diary)
                                           throws application.MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeBeforeStart,
                                                  application.MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeSameTime,
                                                  application.MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeStartConflict,
                                                  application.MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty
        Validate a meeting that is to be added to a Diary
        Parameters:
        date - Date that the meeting occurs
        startTime - Time that the meeting starts
        endTime - Time that the meeting ends
        desc - Description of meeting
        diary - Diary to add to
        Returns:
        reference to new meeting
        Throws:
        MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeBeforeStart - Thrown if end time comes before start time
        MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeSameTime - Thrown if meeting starts and ends at the same time
        MeetingManagerExceptions.MeetingTimeStartConflict - Thrown if meeting time conflicts with another meeting.
        MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty - Thrown if a field is empty.

      • sameDay

        public static boolean sameDay(java.util.Date date1,
                              java.util.Date date2)
        Determines if two Date objects are on the same day.
        Parameters:
        date1 - Date object to compare.
        date2 - Second Date object to compare.
        Returns:
        true if the dates are on the same day, false otherwise.

      • validateNumber

        public static int validateNumber(java.lang.String s)
                          throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        This method is used to validate a number that is given to the program.
        Parameters:
        s - String to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Number (if valid)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Throws if the number is invalid.

      • validateEmployeeDetails

        public static application.Employee validateEmployeeDetails(java.lang.String id,
                                                           java.lang.String forename,
                                                           java.lang.String surname,
                                                           java.lang.String jobTitle)
                                                    throws application.MeetingManagerExceptions.EmployeeDetailsInvalidID,
                                                           application.MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty,
                                                           application.MeetingManagerExceptions.EmployeeExists
        This method is used to validate employee details gathered from the program.
        Parameters:
        id - ID to be valiated.
        forename - Forename to be validated.
        surname - Surname to be validated.
        jobTitle - Job title to be validated.
        Returns:
        Employee Reference to Employee object if valid.
        Throws:
        MeetingManagerExceptions.EmployeeDetailsInvalidID - Thrown if the ID is a non-integer
        MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty - Thrown if details are left blank.
        MeetingManagerExceptions.EmployeeExists - Thrown if the employee ID is taken.

      • validateTask

        public static application.Task validateTask(java.lang.String description,
                                            java.lang.String priority)
                                     throws application.MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty,
                                            application.MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty
        method to validate task
        Parameters:
        description - as the description of the task
        priority - as teh priority level of the task
        Returns:
        the task that has been validated
        Throws:
        MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty - if the field empty
        MeetingManagerExceptions.GenericFieldEmpty - if the field is empty
